title: Beautyful Problems
description: Goldie tries to find his feet in a law firm. His struggles are mirrored by his friend, Victor's own shot at life in a bank. As he pursues love and happiness, his work leads him into a muddled political plot. Secret paths align and hidden revelations are unearthed, sparing neither love nor ambition. Everyone is fair game!
author: Matsiko Godwin Muhwezi
